name: STALIN vs PUTIN
description:
This game is a 2D-shooter. In it you can shoot and destroy enemies, fly on smolets, fight for communism all over the world. You are confronted with the president of Russia and the United States, but also include bombs that they produce.

In the game you will enjoy a pleasing design of the cartoon, pleasant music, lots of enemies and the opportunity to play one of the most influential people on the planet.

Fight, kill enemies and, most importantly, survive in this difficult battle.

Features:
Your character is the most influential person in Russia
The ability to make a world history
Opportunity to fight with the most influential people on the planet
